Spell Effect: Iron Gut (3rd Level).name: 法术效果: Iron Gut (3rd Level)

Spell Effect: Juvenile Companion.name: 法术效果: Juvenile Companion
Spell Effect: Juvenile Companion.description: The creature becomes Tiny (if it was larger), and its reach is reduced to 0 feet. All of its Speeds are halved (to a minimum Speed of 5 feet), and it gains weakness 5 to physical damage.

Spell Effect: Ki Form.name: 法术效果: Ki Form
Spell Effect: Ki Form.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.YDMOqndvYFu3OjA6]{Ki Form}

Drawing from deep wells of spiritual power, you take on a special ki form. In your ki form, your hair, feathers, skin, or scales change color and begin to glow.

In this form you gain a Fly Speed equal to your land Speed.

Choose force, lawful (only if you are lawful), negative, or positive damage.

All your Strikes deal [[/r {1d6}]]{1d6 additional damage of the chosen type}.

Your entire body is also surrounded by a glowing corona of the same color as your inner ki; this is a light effect. Your corona is a 5-foot emanation that deals [[/r {2d6}[force]]]{2d6 damage of the chosen type} to creatures who start their turn within the emanation. If the emanation overlaps with a darkness effect, the corona's glow attempts to counteract the darkness effect. Regardless of the outcome, the corona can't attempt to counteract that effect again for 1 day. As a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can flare your corona out to become a 30-foot emanation.

In your ki form, your emotions surge to the forefront and it's difficult to moderate your attacks. Your weapons and unarmed attacks lose the nonlethal trait. You take a -2 status penalty to saves against emotion effects but gain a +2 status bonus to saves against all other mental effects.

Spell Effect: Lay on Hands.name: 法术效果: Lay on Hands
Spell Effect: Lay on Hands.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{Lay on Hands}

If the target is one of your allies, they also gain a +2 status bonus to AC for 1 round.

Spell Effect: Lay on Hands (Vs. Undead).name: 法术效果: Lay on Hands (Vs. Undead)
Spell Effect: Lay on Hands (Vs. Undead).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.IxyD7YdRbSSucxZp]{Lay on Hands (Vs. Undead)}

If the target is undead, they also gain a -2 status penalty to AC for 1 round.

Spell Effect: Levitate.name: 法术效果: Levitate
Spell Effect: Levitate.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.fI20AVwOzJMHXRdo]{Levitate}。

You take a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls while floating in the air. You can spend an Interact action to stabilize yourself and negate this penalty for the remainder of the turn.

Spell Effect: Life Connection.name: 法术效果: Life Connection
Spell Effect: Life Connection.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.HIY4XUJZKmFLAJTn]{Life Connection}。

You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.5V49l0K460CcvBOO]{Defend Life} reaction; once you use the reaction, the spell ends.

Spell Effect: Life-Giving Form.name: 法术效果: Life-Giving Form
Spell Effect: Life-Giving Form.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9kOI14Jep97TzGO7]{Life-Giving Form}

You gain resistance 5 to precision damage and weakness 5 to negative damage, and your unarmed Strikes deal an extra [[/r {1d4}[positive]]]{1d4 positive damage}.

You can touch a living creature with an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} action to restore [[/r {6d8}[healing]]]{6d8 Hit Points} to it, and when a creature touches you with an Interact action you can allow it to gain the same healing; either way, the creature becomes temporarily immune to life-giving form's healing for 1 minute. This is a positive healing effect. You can't heal yourself with life-giving form. A creature harmed by positive damage (such as an undead) that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon instead takes [[/r {3d4}[positive]]]{3d4 positive damage}, and it doesn't become temporarily immune.

You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} this spell.

Heightened (+1) Increase the Hit Points restored with an Interact action by [[/r 1d8]], the positive damage by 1, and the resistance and weakness by 1.

Spell Effect: Light.name: 法术效果: Light
Spell Effect: Light.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.WBmvzNDfpwka3qT4]{Light}

The object glows, casting bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet) like a torch. If you cast this spell again on a second object, the light spell on the first object ends.

Heightened (4th) The object sheds bright light in a 60-foot radius (and dim light for the next 60 feet).

Spell Effect: Litany of Depravity.name: 法术效果: Litany of Depravity
Spell Effect: Litany of Depravity.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.tYP8unoR0a5Dq9EA]{Litany of Depravity}。

You gain weakness 7 to evil.

Heightened (+1) The weakness increases by 1.

Spell Effect: Litany of Righteousness.name: 法术效果: Litany of Righteousness
Spell Effect: Litany of Righteousness.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.n3b3pDmA6L5YRTyq]{Litany of Righteousness}。

You gain weakness 7 to good.

Heightened (+1) The weakness increases by 1.

Spell Effect: Litany of Self-Interest.name: 法术效果: Litany of Self-Interest
Spell Effect: Litany of Self-Interest.description: Granted by failing the save against @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.mm3hZ6jgaJaKK16n]{Litany of Self-Interest}

Spell Effect: Longstrider.name: 法术效果: Longstrider
Spell Effect: Longstrider.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.KcLVELhCUcKXxiKE]{Longstrider}

You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed.

Spell Effect: Longstrider (8 hours).name: 法术效果: Longstrider (8 hours)
Spell Effect: Longstrider (8 hours).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.KcLVELhCUcKXxiKE]{Longstrider}

You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed.

Spell Effect: Lucky Number.name: 法术效果: Lucky Number
Spell Effect: Lucky Number.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rDDYGY2ekZ1yVv7q]{Lucky Number}。

You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.kUME7DMhhHH6eIiH]{That's My Number} reaction; once you use the reaction, the spell ends.

Spell Effect: Mage Armor.name: 法术效果: Mage Armor
Spell Effect: Mage Armor.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.aAbfKn8maGjJjk2W]{Mage Armor}

You ward yourself with shimmering magical energy, gaining a +1 item bonus to AC and a maximum Dexterity modifier of +5. While wearing mage armor, you use your unarmored proficiency to calculate your AC.

Spell Effect: Magic Fang.name: 法术效果: Magic Fang
Spell Effect: Magic Fang.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.EE7Q5BHIrfWNCPtT]{Magic Fang}

The unarmed attack becomes a +1 striking unarmed attack, gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of damage dice to two if it had only one.

Spell Effect: Magic Weapon.name: 法术效果: Magic Weapon
Spell Effect: Magic Weapon.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.TFitdEOpQC4SzKQQ]{Magic Weapon}

The weapon glimmers with magic and energy. The target becomes a +1 striking weapon, gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of weapon damage dice to two.

Spell Effect: Magic's Vessel.name: 法术效果: Magic's Vessel
Spell Effect: Magic's Vessel.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.u4FGIUQgruLjml7J]{Magic's Vessel}。

The target gains a +1 status bonus to saving throws.

Spell Effect: Mantle of the Frozen Heart.name: 法术效果: Mantle of the Frozen Heart (Ice Glide)
Spell Effect: Mantle of the Frozen Heart.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.CcXtbTxtdV9MKQfu]{Mantle of the Frozen Heart}

You surround yourself in a mantle of frigid ice magic, and your skin and armor morph into cold blue ice. Freezing air emanates from your body, sending a chill down anyone's spine who draws too close and leaving a fine dusting of frost in your wake. As a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can change one of your chosen abilities to a different option from the list.

  • Ice Glide Ice trails from your feet for an instant as you move, allowing you to skate rapidly along the ice. You don't need to Balance on ice, and you ignore difficult terrain caused by ice or snow. While moving along a smooth surface, you gain a +20-foot status bonus to your land Speed.

Spell Effect: Mantle of the Frozen Heart.name: 法术效果: Mantle of the Frozen Heart (Icy Claws)
Spell Effect: Mantle of the Frozen Heart.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.CcXtbTxtdV9MKQfu]{Mantle of the Frozen Heart}

You surround yourself in a mantle of frigid ice magic, and your skin and armor morph into cold blue ice. Freezing air emanates from your body, sending a chill down anyone's spine who draws too close and leaving a fine dusting of frost in your wake. As a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can change one of your chosen abilities to a different option from the list.

  • Icy Claws Your hands morph into vicious, piercing claws of ice useful for attacking or climbing. As long as you have both hands free, you gain a climb Speed equal to your land Speed. You gain a claw unarmed attack with the 灵巧 and finesse traits, in the brawling weapon group. Your claw attack deals 1d6 piercing damage as its base damage, plus an additional 2d6 cold damage.

Spell Effect: Mantle of the Magma Heart.name: 法术效果: Mantle of the Magma Heart (Enlarging Eruption)
Spell Effect: Mantle of the Magma Heart.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.j2kfNBFpLa0JjVr8]{Mantle of the Magma Heart}

You surround yourself in a mantle of blazing fire magic, and your skin and anything you're wearing morphs into burning hot lava. The air around you swelters with heat, and tiny sparks of flame dance behind you as you pass. As a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can change one of your chosen abilities to a different option from the list.

  • Enlarging Eruption You erupt in lava, which clings to you and hardens, causing your body to swell and burst until you grow to size Large. You're clumsy 1. Your reach increases by 5 feet (or by 10 feet if you started out Tiny), and you gain a +2 status bonus to melee damage. You can't choose this option if you're already Large or larger.

Spell Effect: Mantle of the Magma Heart.name: 法术效果: Mantle of the Magma Heart (Fiery Grasp)
Spell Effect: Mantle of the Magma Heart.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.j2kfNBFpLa0JjVr8]{Mantle of the Magma Heart}

You surround yourself in a mantle of blazing fire magic, and your skin and anything you're wearing morphs into burning hot lava. The air around you swelters with heat, and tiny sparks of flame dance behind you as you pass. As a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can change one of your chosen abilities to a different option from the list.

  • Fiery Grasp Your hands swell and grow with lava. You gain a lava fist unarmed attack in the brawling weapon group. Your lava fists deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage as their base damage, plus an additional 2d6 fire damage and 1d6 persistent fire damage.

Spell Effect: Mimic Undead.name: 法术效果: Mimic Undead
Spell Effect: Mimic Undead.description: You take death and wrap it about you like a cloak-your colors wash out and your skin grows cold to the touch. Your heartbeat, breathing, and similar life functions become very difficult to detect. Senses such as lifesense detect you as undead unless a creature succeeds at a Perception check against the spell's DC, and on a failed check, they don't detect you at all if they only sense living creatures. Detection spells that specifically sense living creatures must succeed at a counteract check against mimic undead to detect you. You gain a +4 status bonus to Impersonate an undead but physically intact version of yourself and can add your level as your proficiency bonus even if you're untrained. You don't gain these benefits to Impersonate any other sort of undead. Mindless undead usually don't have a reason to even attempt the Perception check to notice your Impersonation unless you interact with them in some way.

Spell Effect: Mind Blank.name: 法术效果: Mind Blank
Spell Effect: Mind Blank.description: Powerful wards hide a creature from divination magic. The target gains a +4 status bonus to saves against mental effects. Mind blank attempts to counteract any detection, revelation, and scrying effects as if its spell level were 1 higher than its actual level. On a success, the divination effect functions normally except that it detects nothing about the target and its possessions. For instance, detect magic would still detect other magic in the area, but not any magic on the target.

Spell Effect: Mind Swap (Critical Succes.name: 法术效果: Mind Swap (大成功)
Spell Effect: Mind Swap (Critical Succes.description: The mind swap is unusually smooth, and the targets gain a +4 circumstance bonus to Deception checks to Impersonate each other.

Spell Effect: Mirecloak.name: 法术效果: Mirecloak
Spell Effect: Mirecloak.description: You wrap the targeted creatures in thin, sickly green shrouds that sap information from attackers. The shroud settles about each target's shoulders, granting a +1 status bonus to AC and a +2 status bonus to Stealth checks, both only while the target is in dim light or darkness.

Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Phoenix).name: 法术效果: Monstrosity Form (Phoenix)
Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Phoenix).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.8AMvNVOUEtxBCDvJ]{Monstrosity Form}

You transform into the shape of a legendary monster, assuming a Huge battle form. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. While in this form, you gain the beast trait. You can Dismiss the spell.

你获得后续数据和能力，无论你选择哪种战斗形态：

  • AC = 20 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20临时生命值。
  • 黑暗视觉。
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +28, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +30, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of monster you choose:

  • Phoenix
    • 速度30尺, 飞行Speed 90尺;
    • 近战1 beak (触及15尺), 伤害 2d6+12 piercing plus 2d4 fire and [[/r {2d4}[persistent,fire]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage};
    • 近战 1 talon (灵巧, 触及15尺), 伤害 2d8+12 slashing;
    • Shroud of Flame (aura, evocation, fire, primal) 20 feet. You gain an aura of fire that extends out from you. A creature that enters or ends its turn within the aura takes [[/r {2d6}[fire]]]{2d6火焰伤害}. A creature can take this damage only once per turn. You can use a single action, which has the concentrate trait, to activate or deactivate this aura.

Heightened (9th) You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 25 temporary HP, attack modifier +31, increase damage by one damage die, and Athletics +33.

Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Purple W.name: 法术效果: Monstrosity Form (Purple Worm)
Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Purple W.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.8AMvNVOUEtxBCDvJ]{Monstrosity Form}

You transform into the shape of a legendary monster, assuming a Huge battle form. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. While in this form, you gain the animal trait. You can Dismiss the spell.

你获得后续数据和能力，无论你选择哪种战斗形态：

  • AC = 20 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20临时生命值。
  • 黑暗视觉。
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +28, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +30, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of monster you choose:

  • Purple Worm
    • 速度40 feet, burrow Speed 30尺, 游泳速度20尺;
    • 近战 1 啃咬 (触及10尺), 伤害 2d12+20穿刺;
    • 近战 1 stinger (灵巧, 触及10尺), 伤害 2d8+15 piercing plus @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Poison2d6.success];
    • 近战 1 body (触及10 feet) 伤害 2d8+20钝击;
    • Inexorable You automatically recover from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} conditions at the end of each of your turns. You're also immune to being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} and ignore difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain.

Heightened (9th) You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 25 temporary HP, attack modifier +31, increase damage by one damage die, and Athletics +33.

Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Sea Serp.name: 法术效果: Monstrosity Form (Sea Serpent)
Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Sea Serp.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.8AMvNVOUEtxBCDvJ]{Monstrosity Form}

You transform into the shape of a legendary monster, assuming a Huge battle form. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. While in this form, you gain the animal trait. You can Dismiss the spell.

你获得后续数据和能力，无论你选择哪种战斗形态：

  • AC = 20 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20临时生命值。
  • 黑暗视觉。
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +28, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +30, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of monster you choose:

  • Sea Serpent
    • 速度20尺, 游泳速度90尺;
    • 近战 1 啃咬 (触及15尺), 伤害 2d12+20穿刺;
    • 近战 1 tail (触及25尺), 伤害 2d8+20钝击;
    • Spine Rake 2 (move) You extend your spines and Swim or Stride. Each creature you're adjacent to at any point during your movement takes 4d8+10 slashing damage (basic Reflex against your spell DC).

Heightened (9th) You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 25 temporary HP, attack modifier +31, increase damage by one damage die, and Athletics +33.

Spell Effect: Nature Incarnate (Green Ma.name: 法术效果: Nature Incarnate (Green Man)
Spell Effect: Nature Incarnate (Green Ma.description:
The primal power of the world flows through you. You transform into an incarnation of nature, either a green man or a kaiju. Your battle form is Medium for a green man or Gargantuan (30-foot-by-30-foot space) for a kaiju. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. While in this form, you gain the plant trait (for a green man) or the beast trait (for a kaiju). You can Dismiss the spell.

你获得后续数据和能力，无论你选择哪种战斗形态：

  • AC=25+你的等级。忽略你的护甲检定减值和速度减值。
  • 30临时生命值。
  • 黑暗视觉。
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +34, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +36, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of incarnation you choose:

  • Green Man
    • 速度40尺, 攀爬速度40尺;
    • 近战 1 vines (触及30 feet, versatile P), 伤害 6d8+12钝击;
    • 远程 1 thorns (射程100尺), 伤害 6d6+6穿刺;
    • Green Caress (aura, primal, transmutation) 60 feet. Enemies other than plants must succeed at a Fortitude save against your spell DC or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} for 1 round Clumsy 2 on a critical failure).

Spell Effect: Nature Incarnate (Kaiju).name: 法术效果: Nature Incarnate (Kaiju)
Spell Effect: Nature Incarnate (Kaiju).description:
The primal power of the world flows through you. You transform into an incarnation of nature, either a green man or a kaiju. Your battle form is Medium for a green man or Gargantuan (30-foot-by-30-foot space) for a kaiju. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. While in this form, you gain the plant trait (for a green man) or the beast trait (for a kaiju). You can Dismiss the spell.

你获得后续数据和能力，无论你选择哪种战斗形态：

  • AC=25+你的等级。忽略你的护甲检定减值和速度减值。
  • 30临时生命值。
  • 黑暗视觉。
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +34, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +36, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of incarnation you choose:

  • Kaiju 速度50尺; resistance 5 to physical damage;
    • 近战 1 jaws (触及30尺), 伤害 6d10+10穿刺;
    • 近战 1 claws (灵巧, 触及30尺), 伤害 6d8+8 slashing;
    • 近战 1 foot (灵巧, 触及15尺), 伤害 6d6+10钝击;
    • Unstoppable You are immune to being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} and ignore difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain;
    • Trample 3 You move up to double your Speed and move through the spaces of Huge or smaller creatures, trampling each creature whose space you enter. A trampled creature takes foot damage with a basic Reflex save against your spell DC.

Spell Effect: Necromancer's Generosity.name: 法术效果: Necromancer's Generosity
Spell Effect: Necromancer's Generosity.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.JUJYVbtNNFdvyrBS]{Necromancer's Generosity}

Your undead minion gains a +2 status bonus to saves against positive effects for the duration.

Spell Effect: Necrotize (Legs).name: 法术效果: Necrotize (Legs)
Spell Effect: Necrotize (Legs).description: The target's legs necrotize, as well as any other limbs associated with forms of movement, making it harder for the creature to move. The target takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds.

Spell effect: Nudge the Odds.name: Spell effect: Nudge the Odds
Spell effect: Nudge the Odds.description:
You bestow yourself supernaturally good luck at cards, dice, and other games of chance. You gain a +1 status bonus to Games Lore checks to gamble, and if you roll a critical failure on such a check, you get a failure instead; however, the spell is too short-lived to use for Earn Income checks from gambling.

When you're under the effect of nudge the odds, one facial feature, such as a lock of hair or the iris of an eye, transforms to a distinctive golden color; the GM chooses which feature when you cast the spell. This change resists all magical efforts to conceal it, though it can be hidden or covered by mundane means. A creature noticing the feature can identify the spell using Recall Knowledge. Because it prevents losing big, gamblers consider nudge the odds a repugnant form of cheating. If you're caught using the spell, you are likely to suffer serious consequences, depending on the nature of the gamblers you cheated.

Heightened (5th) The status bonus increases to +2, and the duration increases to last until the next time you make your daily preparations. If you continue spending your spell slot to keep the duration active, this allows you to apply the effect to a downtime check to Earn Income.

Spell Effect: Nymph's Token.name: 法术效果: Nymph's Token
Spell Effect: Nymph's Token.description: Granted by holding the token created by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.pHrVvoTKygXeczVG]{Nymph's Token}

Spell Effect: Object Memory (Weapon).name: 法术效果: Object Memory (Weapon)
Spell Effect: Object Memory (Weapon).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.RztmhJrLLQWoGVdB]{Object Memory}。

If you touch a weapon, your proficiency rank with that weapon temporarily increases to trained (if it is not already higher).

Heightened (6th) Your proficiency rank increases to expert instead of trained.

Spell Effect: One With the Land.name: 法术效果: One With the Land
Spell Effect: One With the Land.description:
You merge with an adjacent natural feature with enough volume to fit you and your worn and held possessions, such as the ground or a large tree. Your merged form is visible within the feature, and creatures can target and attack you normally, though you have cover and can use it to Hide or Take Cover within the feature. You can cast spells while in the feature as long as they don't require line of effect beyond the feature. You can Dismiss the spell. While merged, you gain the following additional benefits.

  • You immediately become aware of the surrounding terrain features, and you gain tremorsense as an imprecise sense with a range of 200 feet.
  • You can make terrain vengeance Strikes by commanding plants, rocks, and other natural features to attack your foes. These are melee Strikes that use your spell attack roll, can target any creature within 60 feet of you, and deal [[/r 5d12]] bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage. You choose the damage type each time you make a terrain vengeance Strike.
  • By spending a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can increase or decrease the environmental temperature changing it to either one step warmer than normal, one step colder than normal, or the normal temperature.
  • As a 2-action activity that has the concentrate trait, you can create or remove difficult terrain caused by natural terrain in a 20-foot burst within 200 feet. All of your alterations to the land end when the spell ends. Significant physical damage to the natural feature while you are inside it expels you and deals [[/r {10d6}]]{10d6 damage} to you.

Spell Effect: Ooze Form (Black Pudding).name: 法术效果: Ooze Form (Black Pudding)
Spell Effect: Ooze Form (Black Pudding).description:
You invoke all things that seep and ooze, your body dissolving into a thick slurry and then reconstituting itself into a Medium ooze battle form. When you first cast this spell, choose black pudding, gelatinous cube, gray ooze, or ochre jelly. While in this form, you gain the ooze trait. You can Dismiss the spell. 你获得后续数据和能力，无论你选择哪种战斗形态：

  • AC = 7 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20临时生命值。
  • You are immune to critical hits, precision damage, and visual effects.
  • Resistance 5 to acid, piercing, and slashing damage.
  • No vision and motion sense 30 feet. You can sense nearby motion through vibration and air movement as a precise sense.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +14, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +14, unless your own is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the ooze:

  • Black Pudding 速度15 feet, climb 15尺;
    • 近战 1 pseudopod, 伤害 [[/r {2d6+5}[bludgeoning]]]{2d6+5 bludgeoning} and [[/r {1d8}[acid]]]{1d8 acid}.

Heightened (4th) Your battle form is Large, and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 30 temporary HP; resistance 7 to acid, piercing, and slashing; attack modifier +16; damage bonus +9; and Athletics +16. Your motion sense has a range of 40 feet.

Heightened (5th) Your battle form is Huge, and your attacks have 15-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 40 temporary HP; resistance 10 to acid, piercing, and slashing; attack modifier +18; damage bonus +6 and double damage dice; and Athletics +20. Your motion sense has a range of 60 feet.

Heightened (8th) Your battle form is Gargantuan (20-foot- by-20-foot space), and your attacks have 20-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 60 temporary HP; resistance 12 to acid, piercing, and slashing; attack modifier +28; damage bonus +13 and double damage dice; and Athletics +29. Your motion sense has a range of 60 feet.

Spell Effect: Ooze Form (Gelatinous Cube.name: 法术效果: Ooze Form (Gelatinous Cube)
Spell Effect: Ooze Form (Gelatinous Cube.description:
You invoke all things that seep and ooze, your body dissolving into a thick slurry and then reconstituting itself into a Medium ooze battle form. When you first cast this spell, choose black pudding, gelatinous cube, gray ooze, or ochre jelly. While in this form, you gain the ooze trait. You can Dismiss the spell. 你获得后续数据和能力，无论你选择哪种战斗形态：

  • AC = 7 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20临时生命值。
  • You are immune to critical hits, precision damage, and visual effects.
  • Resistance 5 to acid, piercing, and slashing damage.
  • No vision and motion sense 30 feet. You can sense nearby motion through vibration and air movement as a precise sense.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +14, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +14, unless your own is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the ooze:

  • Black Pudding 速度15 feet, climb 15尺;
    • 近战 1 pseudopod, 伤害 [[/r {2d6+5}[bludgeoning]]]{2d6+5 bludgeoning} and [[/r {1d8}[acid]]]{1d8 acid}.
  • Gelatinous Cube 速度15尺;
    • 近战 1 cube face, 伤害 [[/r {1d6+5}[acid]]]{1d6+5 acid};
    • a creature hit by your cube face Strike must succeed at a Fortitude save against your spell DC or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 1 round on a critical failure); this save has the incapacitation trait.
  • Gray Ooze 速度15 feet, climb 15尺, 游泳15尺;
    • 近战 1 pseudopod, 伤害 [[/r {1d6+5}[bludgeoning]]]{1d6+5 bludgeoning} and [[/r {1d6}[acid]]]{1d6 acid}, and you can spend an action after a hit to Grab the target.
  • Ochre Jelly 速度15 feet, climb 10尺; resistance 5 to electricity;
    • 近战 1 pseudopod, 伤害 [[/r {1d8+5}[bludgeoning]]]{1d8+5 bludgeoning} and [[/r {1d8}[acid]]]{1d8 acid}, and you can spend an action after a hit to Grab the target.

Heightened (4th) Your battle form is Large, and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 30 temporary HP; resistance 7 to acid, piercing, and slashing; attack modifier +16; damage bonus +9; and Athletics +16. Your motion sense has a range of 40 feet.

Heightened (5th) Your battle form is Huge, and your attacks have 15-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 40 temporary HP; resistance 10 to acid, piercing, and slashing; attack modifier +18; damage bonus +6 and double damage dice; and Athletics +20. Your motion sense has a range of 60 feet.

Heightened (8th) Your battle form is Gargantuan (20-foot- by-20-foot space), and your attacks have 20-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 60 temporary HP; resistance 12 to acid, piercing, and slashing; attack modifier +28; damage bonus +13 and double damage dice; and Athletics +29. Your motion sense has a range of 60 feet.

Spell Effect: Organsight.name: 法术效果: Organsight
Spell Effect: Organsight.description:
You see the target as though it's dissected and arrayed before you. For the duration, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus on Medicine checks against the target that depend on its organs, but a -2 circumstance penalty on Medicine checks depending on seeing its skin.

When you Cast the Spell, attempt a special Recall Knowledge check using Medicine to spot and discern a vital organ. If you have a Lore skill appropriate to the creature, you can use that skill instead of Medicine. If you succeed, the next time you deal piercing or slashing damage to the target with a Strike or spell, you deal 4d6 additional precision damage. Once on each of your subsequent turns, you can use a single action to attempt the special Recall Knowledge check again. The extra damage isn't cumulative, so making the check more than once before a Strike or spell has no extra benefit.

Heightened (+1) The precision damage increases by [[/r 1d6]]{1d6}.

Spell Effect: Penumbral Disguise.name: 法术效果: Penumbral Disguise
Spell Effect: Penumbral Disguise.description:
You wrap the target in shadows, granting them a +1 status bonus to Stealth checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} while in dim light or darkness.

In addition, the shadows mask the creature's features. While the creature is in dim light or darkness, other creatures must succeed at a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{搜索 Seek} action against the spell's DC to discern details about the target's appearance. For example, without using Seek, other creatures can determine the target's general shape (such as humanoid), but they would need to Seek to determine the target's precise appearance or any other identifying information.

Creatures with darkvision can still see the target and their features normally. The target's normal appearance is revealed in bright light.

Heightened (4th) The status bonus is +2. Creatures with darkvision can no longer discern details about the target while the target is in dim light or darkness without Seeking, though creatures with greater darkvision can still determine these details.

Heightened (6th) As 4th level, except the status bonus is +3 and creatures without darkvision can't determine even general details about the target while the target is in dim light or darkness unless they successfully Seek the target; these creatures see a vague shadow instead. Even on a successful Seek, they only determine general features, though they can see details on a critical success.

Heightened (8th) As 6th level, except the status bonus is +4 and even creatures with greater darkvision must Seek to discern details about the target while the target is in dim light or darkness.

Spell Effect: Pest Form.name: 法术效果: Pest Form
Spell Effect: Pest Form.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gfPjmG6Fe6D3MFjl]{Pest Form}。

You transform into a the battle form of a Tiny animal, such as a cat, insect, lizard, or rat. You can decide the specific type of animal (such as a rat or praying mantis), but this has no effect on the form's Size or statistics. While in this form, you gain the animal trait. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities:

  • AC = 15 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 速度20 feet.
  • Weakness 5 to physical damage. (If you take physical damage in this form, you take 5 additional damage.)
  • 昏暗视觉和模糊嗅觉30尺。
  • Acrobatics and Stealth modifiers of +10, unless your own modifier is higher; Athletics modifier -4.

Heightened (4th) You can turn into a flying creature, such as a bird, which grants you a fly Speed of 20 feet.

Spell Effect: Plant Form (Arboreal).name: 法术效果: Plant Form (Arboreal)
Spell Effect: Plant Form (Arboreal).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.zCcfPS4y5SrZzU2x]{Plant Form}。

Taking inspiration from verdant creatures, you transform into a Large plant battle form. You must have space to expand into or the spell is lost. You can substitute a similar specific plant to turn into (such as a pitcher plant instead of a flytrap), but this has no effect on the form's Size or statistics. While in this form, you gain the plant trait. You can Dismiss the spell.

你获得后续数据和能力，无论你选择哪种战斗形态：

  • AC=19+你的等级。忽略你的护甲检定减值和速度减值。
  • 12 temporary Hit Points.
  • 对毒素抗力10。
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +17, and your damage bonus is +11. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +19, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of plant you choose:

  • Arboreal
    • 速度30尺; you can speak in this form, but you still can't Cast a Spell or supply verbal components.
    • 近战 1 branch (触及15尺), 伤害 2d10钝击;
    • 近战 1 foot, 伤害 2d8 bludgeoning

Heightened (6th) Your battle form is Huge, and the reach of your attacks increases by 5 feet. You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 24 temporary HP, attack modifier +21, damage bonus +16, and Athletics +22.
