Spell Effect: Pocket Library.name: 法术效果: Pocket Library
Spell Effect: Pocket Library.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.TjWHgXqPv5jywMti]{Pocket Library}

During the duration of this spell, you can call forth a tome from the extradimensional library when attempting a Recall Knowledge check using your chosen skill. This is part of the action to Recall Knowledge. You must have a hand free to do so. The tome appears in your hand, open to an appropriate page. This grants you a +1 status bonus on the Recall Knowledge check. If you roll a critical failure on this check, you get a failure instead. If the roll is successful and the subject is a creature, you gain additional information or context about the creature.

Spell Effect: Primal Summons (Air).name: 法术效果: Primal Summons (Air)
Spell Effect: Primal Summons (Air).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.kwlKUxEuT8T15YW6]{Primal Summons} when you select air.

The creature gains a fly Speed of 60 feet.

Spell Effect: Primal Summons (Earth).name: 法术效果: Primal Summons (Earth)
Spell Effect: Primal Summons (Earth).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.kwlKUxEuT8T15YW6]{Primal Summons} when you select earth.

The creature gains a burrow Speed of 20 feet, and reduces its land Speed by 10 feet (minimum 5 feet).

Spell Effect: Primal Summons (Fire).name: 法术效果: Primal Summons (Fire)
Spell Effect: Primal Summons (Fire).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.kwlKUxEuT8T15YW6]{Primal Summons} when you select fire.

The creature's attacks deal 1d6 extra fire damage.

Spell Effect: Primal Summons (Water).name: 法术效果: Primal Summons (Water)
Spell Effect: Primal Summons (Water).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.kwlKUxEuT8T15YW6]{Primal Summons} when you select water.

The creature gains a swim Speed of 60 feet.

Spell Effect: Protect Companion.name: 法术效果: Protect Companion
Spell Effect: Protect Companion.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.AfOpnnwdZwHi2Tnc]{Protect Companion}

The target gains a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Spell Effect: Protection.name: 法术效果: Protection
Spell Effect: Protection.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gMODOGamz88rgHuf]{Protection} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.mpGCMTldMVa0pWYs]{Circle of Protection}

The target gains a +1 status bonus to Armor Class and saving throws against creatures and effects of the chosen alignment.

This bonus increases to +3 against effects from such creatures that would directly control the target and against attacks made by summoned creatures of the chosen alignment.

Spell Effect: Protective Ward.name: 法术效果: Protective Ward
Spell Effect: Protective Ward.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.lY9fOk1qBDDhBT8s]{Protective Ward}

You emanate a shimmering aura of protective magic. You and any allies in the area gain a +1 status bonus to AC. Each time you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.3f5DMFu8fPiqHpRg]{Sustain the Spell}, the emanation's radius increases by 5 feet, to a maximum of 30 feet.

Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation (Aquatic.name: 法术效果: Rapid Adaptation (Aquatic Base Swim Speed)
Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation (Aquatic.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.fTK6ysisGhy3hRvz]{Rapid Adaptation}

The target gains a swim Speed equal to its land Speed. If it already had a swim Speed, it gains a +10-foot status bonus to its swim Speed.

Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation (Aquatic.name: 法术效果: Rapid Adaptation (Aquatic Speed Bonus)
Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation (Aquatic.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.fTK6ysisGhy3hRvz]{Rapid Adaptation}

The target gains a swim Speed equal to its land Speed. If it already had a swim Speed, it gains a +10-foot status bonus to its swim Speed.

Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation (Arctic).name: 法术效果: Rapid Adaptation (Arctic)
Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation (Arctic).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.fTK6ysisGhy3hRvz]{Rapid Adaptation}

The target isn't affected by severe or extreme cold, and when it rolls a success on an Acrobatics check to Balance on ice and snow, it gets a critical success instead.

Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation (Desert).name: 法术效果: Rapid Adaptation (Desert)
Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation (Desert).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.fTK6ysisGhy3hRvz]{Rapid Adaptation}

The target isn't affected by severe or extreme heat, and when it rolls a success on an Acrobatics check to Balance on sand, it gets a critical success instead.

Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation (Forest).name: 法术效果: Rapid Adaptation (Forest)
Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation (Forest).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.fTK6ysisGhy3hRvz]{Rapid Adaptation}

The target gains scent as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet.

Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation (Mountain.name: 法术效果: Rapid Adaptation (Mountain)
Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation (Mountain.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.fTK6ysisGhy3hRvz]{Rapid Adaptation}

The target isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} when Climbing, and when it rolls a success on an Acrobatics check to Balance on rubble, it gets a critical success instead.

Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation (Plains).name: 法术效果: Rapid Adaptation (Plains)
Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation (Plains).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.fTK6ysisGhy3hRvz]{Rapid Adaptation}

The target gains a +10-foot status bonus to its land Speed.

Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation (Undergro.name: 法术效果: Rapid Adaptation (Underground)
Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation (Undergro.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.fTK6ysisGhy3hRvz]{Rapid Adaptation}

The target gains darkvision.

Spell Effect: Ray of Frost.name: 法术效果: Ray of Frost
Spell Effect: Ray of Frost.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gYjPm7YwGtEa1oxh]{Ray of Frost}。

The cold chills your bones, you take a -10-foot status penalty to your Speeds for 1 round.

Spell Effect: Read the Air.name: 法术效果: Read the Air
Spell Effect: Read the Air.description: You also gain a +1 status bonus on your next Diplomacy check to Make an Impression on those creatures present when you cast this spell, as long as the check occurs during the duration of the spell. You can read the air only once in a given social situation; casting it again has no effect.

Spell Effect: Reinforce Eidolon.name: 法术效果: Reinforce Eidolon
Spell Effect: Reinforce Eidolon.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.TYbCj4dgXDOZou9k]{Reinforce Eidolon}

You focus deeply on the link between you and your eidolon and reinforce your eidolon's defenses. Your eidolon gains a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws, plus resistance to all damage equal to half the spell's level. Your eidolon can benefit from either Boost Eidolon or Reinforce Eidolon, but not both; if you cast one of these spells during the other's duration, the newer spell replaces the older one.

Spell Effect: Rejuvenating Flames.name: 法术效果: Rejuvenating Flames
Spell Effect: Rejuvenating Flames.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.lZx8jZfKrMEtyGY0]{Rejuvenating Flames}

You create a gout of flame that both heals and burns. You restore 1d4 HP to all allies in the area, and those allies gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude saves for 1 minute. Enemies in the area take [[/r {1d4}[fire]]]{1d4火焰伤害} with a basic Reflex save. Heightened (+1) You restore an additional 1d4 HP to your allies and deal an additional [[/r {1d4}[fire]]]{1d4火焰伤害} to enemies.

Spell Effect: Rejuvenating Touch.name: 法术效果: Rejuvenating Touch
Spell Effect: Rejuvenating Touch.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{Lay on Hands} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.xZrTjUub7V09sXZF]{Rejuvenating Touch}.

An ally that recovers Hit Points from your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{Lay on Hands} gains 10 temporary Hit Points at the start of their turn during each of the next 10 rounds. This effect ends if the ally is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}.

Spell Effect: Resilient Touch.name: 法术效果: Resilient Touch
Spell Effect: Resilient Touch.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{Lay on Hands} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.tCuMXQ0yMrCNwzqW]{Resilient Touch}.

If the target is one of your allies, they also gain a +2 status bonus to AC and a +1 status bonus to their saving throws until the end of their next turn.

Spell Effect: Resist Energy.name: 法术效果: Resist Energy
Spell Effect: Resist Energy.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Fr58LDSrbndgld9n]{Resist Energy}

A shield of elemental energy protects a creature against one type of energy damage. Choose acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage. The target and its gear gain resistance 5 against the damage type you chose.

Heightened (4th) The resistance increases to 10.

Heightened (7th) The resistance increases to 15.

Spell Effect: Return the Favor.name: 法术效果: Return the Favor
Spell Effect: Return the Favor.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9gMQPCaFM27PEIh4]{Return the Favor}。

You gain 12 temporary Hit Points for 1 minute.

Heightened (+1) The temporary Hit Points increase by 4.

Spell Effect: Righteous Might.name: Spell Effect: Righteous Might
Spell Effect: Righteous Might.description:
Granted By @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.MMCQsh12TPaDdPbV]{Righteous Might}

You focus all your divine energy and transform yourself into a Medium battle form, similar to your normal form but armed with powerful divine armaments granted by your deity. While in this form, you gain the statistics and abilities listed below. You have hands in this battle form and can use manipulate actions. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities:

  • AC = 20 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 10临时生命值。
  • 速度40 feet.
  • Resistance 3 against physical damage.
  • 黑暗视觉。
  • A special attack with a righteous armament version of your favored weapon, which is the only attack you can use. Your attack modifier with the special weapon is +21, and your damage bonus is +8 (or +6 for a ranged attack). If your attack modifier with your deity's favored weapon is higher, you can use it instead. You deal three of your weapon's normal damage dice, or three damage dice of one size larger if your weapon is a simple weapon with a d4 or d6 damage die. The weapon has one of the following properties that matches your deity's alignment: anarchic, axiomatic, holy, unholy. If your deity is true neutral, you instead deal an extra 1d6 precision damage.
  • 运动调整值+23，除非你自身的调整值更高。

Heightened (8th) Your battle form is Large, and your attacks have 10-foot reach, or 15-foot reach if your deity's favored weapon has reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain AC = 21 + your level, 15 temporary HP, resistance 4 against physical damage, attack modifier +28, damage bonus +15 (+12 for a ranged attack), and Athletics +29.

Note: The special attack is not added at this time due to the large amount of player choice and missing deity automation. Additionally, the resistance and removal of armor penalties cannot be automated at present. Please apply these manually for the time being.

Spell Effect: Roar of the Wyrm.name: Spell Effect: Roar of the Wyrm
Spell Effect: Roar of the Wyrm.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.FSu6ZKxr3xdS75wq]{Roar of the Wyrm}。

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Diplomacy checks for 10 minutes against dragons that were in the area at the time of casting.

Spell Effect: Safeguard Secret.name: Spell Effect: Safeguard Secret
Spell Effect: Safeguard Secret.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.OsrtOeG0TvDNnEFH]{Safeguard Secret}。

The targets gain +4 status bonus to skill checks (typically Deception checks) to conceal this knowledge and to saving throws against spells that specifically attempt to obtain this knowledge from them and effects that would force them to reveal it.

Spell Effect: Schadenfreude (Success).name: Spell Effect: Schadenfreude (成功)
Spell Effect: Schadenfreude (Success).description: The creature is distracted by its amusement and takes a -1 status penalty on Perception checks and Will saves for 1 round.

Spell Effect: See Invisibility.name: Spell Effect: See Invisibility
Spell Effect: See Invisibility.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{See Invisibility}。

You can see @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} creatures and objects. They appear to you as translucent shapes, and they are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to you.

Spell Effect: Shield.name: Spell Effect: Shield
Spell Effect: Shield.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{Shield}

You raise a magical shield of force. This counts as using the Raise a Shield action, giving you a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn, but it doesn't require a hand to use. While the spell is in effect, you can use the Shield Block reaction with your magic shield. After you use Shield Block, the spell ends and you can't cast it again for 10 minutes.

Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Claws).name: Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Claws)
Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Claws).description: 效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.SDkIFrrO1PsE02Kd]{Shifting Form} and choosing to gain a pair of claws.

Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Climb Speed.name: Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Climb Speed)
Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Climb Speed.description: 效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.SDkIFrrO1PsE02Kd]{Shifting Form} and choosing to gain a climb speed equal to half your Speed.

Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Darkvision).name: Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Darkvision)
Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Darkvision).description: 效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.SDkIFrrO1PsE02Kd]{Shifting Form} and choosing to gain darkvision.

Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Scent).name: Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Scent)
Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Scent).description: 效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.SDkIFrrO1PsE02Kd]{Shifting Form} and choosing to gain scent 60 feet (imprecise).

Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Speed).name: Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Speed)
Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Speed).description: 效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.SDkIFrrO1PsE02Kd]{Shifting Form} and choosing to gain a 20-foot status bonus to your Speed.

Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Swim Speed).name: Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Swim Speed)
Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Swim Speed).description: 效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.SDkIFrrO1PsE02Kd]{Shifting Form} and choosing to gain a swim speed equal to half your Speed.

Spell Effect: Shillelagh.name: Spell Effect: Shillelagh
Spell Effect: Shillelagh.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.s3abwDbTV43pGFFW]{Shillelagh}

The target grows vines and leaves, brimming with primal energy. The target becomes a +1 striking weapon while in your hands, gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of weapon damage dice to two. Additionally, as long as you are on your home plane, attacks you make with the target against aberrations, extraplanar creatures, and undead increase the number of weapon damage dice to three.

Spell Effect: Shrink.name: Spell Effect: Shrink
Spell Effect: Shrink.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.PjhUmyKnq6K5uDby]{Shrink}

You warp space to make a creature smaller. The target shrinks to become Tiny in size. Its equipment shrinks with it but returns to its original size if removed. The creature's reach changes to 0 feet. This spell has no effect on a Tiny creature.

Spell Effect: Song of Strength.name: Spell Effect: Song of Strength
Spell Effect: Song of Strength.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Xxdwkt0EEDgP1LGc]{Song of Strength}

You bolster your allies' physical strength with a hearty exhortation. You and your allies gain a +1 status bonus to Athletics checks and to their DCs against Athletics skill actions such as Disarm, Shove, and Trip.

Note: bonus to DCs is not automatically added.

Spell Effect: Soothe.name: Spell Effect: Soothe
Spell Effect: Soothe.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.szIyEsvihc5e1w8n]{Soothe}

Your mind is bolstered against hostile effects, granting a +2 status bonus to saves against mental effects for the duration.

Spell Effect: Soothing Blossoms.name: Spell Effect: Soothing Blossoms
Spell Effect: Soothing Blossoms.description: When any creature in the area rolls a successful save against a poison or disease effect, it gets a critical success instead. The blossoms grant assisted recovery to everyone in the area to end their persistent damage, both when the spell is cast and at the start of each of your turns. This spell doesn't give a benefit on a save against an affliction unless the stage lasts 10 minutes or less.

Spell Effect: Soothing Words.name: Spell Effect: Soothing Words
Spell Effect: Soothing Words.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.YGRpHU5yxw73mls8]{Soothing Words}。

The target gains a +1 status bonus to Will saving throws. This bonus increases to +2 against emotion effects

Heightened (5th) The bonus to saves increases to +2, or +3 against emotion effects.

Spell Effect: Speaking Sky.name: Spell Effect: Speaking Sky
Spell Effect: Speaking Sky.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Zvg0FWzClGbzucFd]{Speaking Sky}

The air speaks to you. You can precisely sense any motion within 60 feet through vibration and air movement.

Spell Effect: Stormwind Flight.name: Spell Effect: Stormwind Flight
Spell Effect: Stormwind Flight.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gSFg9zKwgcNZLMEs]{Stormwind Flight}。

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed.

Spell Effect: Stumbling Curse.name: Spell Effect: Stumbling Curse
Spell Effect: Stumbling Curse.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.X8PSYw6WC2ePYSXd]{Stumbling Curse}

The target takes a -2 status penalty to Athletics and Acrobatics checks.

Spell Effect: Summoner's Visage.name: Spell Effect: Summoner's Visage
Spell Effect: Summoner's Visage.description: Your eidolon gains a +4 status bonus to Deception checks to Impersonate you and can add its level to such checks even if it's untrained.

Spell Effect: Swampcall (Critical Failur.name: Spell Effect: Swampcall (大失败)
Spell Effect: Swampcall (Critical Failur.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.lbrWMnS2pecKaSVB]{Swampcall}

You call upon the spirits of the soil to twist and churn, transforming the terrain in the targeted area into a sodden mess. The area becomes difficult terrain. Creatures in the area when you Cast this Spell must attempt a Reflex saving throw.

大失败 The creature sinks partially into the mud. The creature takes a -15-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds (except for its swim Speed, if any) and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed}. These effects last until the creature leaves the area or until the end of its next turn, whichever comes first.

Spell Effect: Swampcall (Failure).name: Spell Effect: Swampcall (失败)
Spell Effect: Swampcall (Failure).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.lbrWMnS2pecKaSVB]{Swampcall}

You call upon the spirits of the soil to twist and churn, transforming the terrain in the targeted area into a sodden mess. The area becomes difficult terrain. Creatures in the area when you Cast this Spell must attempt a Reflex saving throw.

失败 The creature sinks partially into the mud. The creature takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds (except for its swim Speed, if any) and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed}. These effects last until the creature leaves the area or until the end of its next turn, whichever comes first.

Spell Effect: Sweet Dream (Glamour).name: Spell Effect: Sweet Dream (Glamour)
Spell Effect: Sweet Dream (Glamour).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.BRtKFk0PKfWIlCAB]{Sweet Dream}。

You gain +1 status bonus to Charisma-based skill checks.

Spell Effect: Sweet Dream (Insight).name: Spell Effect: Sweet Dream (Insight)
Spell Effect: Sweet Dream (Insight).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.BRtKFk0PKfWIlCAB]{Sweet Dream}。

You gain +1 status bonus to Intelligence-based skill checks.

Spell Effect: Sweet Dream (Voyaging).name: Spell Effect: Sweet Dream (Voyaging)
Spell Effect: Sweet Dream (Voyaging).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.BRtKFk0PKfWIlCAB]{Sweet Dream}。

You gain +5 foot status bonus to your Speed.

Spell Effect: Take Its Course (Afflictio.name: Spell Effect: Take Its Course (Affliction, Help)
Spell Effect: Take Its Course (Afflictio.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.ZeHeNQ5BNq6m5F1j]{Take its Course}, when used to help a target against an affliction.

The target gains a +2 status bonus to its saving throw against the affliction.

Spell Effect: Take Its Course (Afflictio.name: Spell Effect: Take Its Course (Affliction, Hinder)
Spell Effect: Take Its Course (Afflictio.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.ZeHeNQ5BNq6m5F1j]{Take its Course}, when used to hinder a target against an affliction.

The target gains a -2 status bonus to its saving throw against the affliction.

Spell Effect: Tanglefoot.name: Spell Effect: Tanglefoot
Spell Effect: Tanglefoot.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.uZK2BYzPnxUBnDjr]{Tanglefoot}。

Vines hamper your movement, you take a -10-foot circumstance penalty to your Speeds.

Note: the duration needs to be increased to 2 rounds when the spell is heightened to 2nd level, and to 1 minute when the spell is heightened to 4th level.

Spell Effect: Tempest Form (Air).name: Spell Effect: Tempest Form (Air)
Spell Effect: Tempest Form (Air).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.zhqnMOVPzVvWSUbC]{Tempest Form}

Your body becomes fluid to better suit your surroundings.

When you cast this spell, choose whether to become air, water, or mist. The spell gains the air trait if you choose air or mist, and the water trait if you choose water or mist.

You become amorphous, as does your armor. You lose any item bonus to AC and use your proficiency bonus for unarmored defense to determine your AC. You also gain resistance 10 to physical damage and become immune to precision damage. You can slip through tiny cracks and don't need to breathe. You can't cast spells, activate items, or use actions that have the attack or manipulate trait. You also gain the following effects based on your form.

Air

  • You gain a Fly Speed of 20 feet and become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} while you are in the air.
  • You can create the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.g8QqHpv2CWDwmIm1]{Gust of Wind} from your space as a 2-action activity, which has the manipulate trait.

Heightened (+2) Increase the resistance by 5.

Spell Effect: Tempest Form (Mist).name: Spell Effect: Tempest Form (Mist)
Spell Effect: Tempest Form (Mist).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.zhqnMOVPzVvWSUbC]{Tempest Form}

Your body becomes fluid to better suit your surroundings.

When you cast this spell, choose whether to become air, water, or mist. The spell gains the air trait if you choose air or mist, and the water trait if you choose water or mist.

You become amorphous, as does your armor. You lose any item bonus to AC and use your proficiency bonus for unarmored defense to determine your AC. You also gain resistance 10 to physical damage and become immune to precision damage. You can slip through tiny cracks and don't need to breathe. You can't cast spells, activate items, or use actions that have the attack or manipulate trait. You also gain the following effects based on your form.

Mist

  • You gain a Fly Speed of 20 feet, and it becomes hard to see through you.
  • Any creature on one side of your space who is targeted by a creature on the opposite side is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to the targeting creature.

Heightened (+2) Increase the resistance by 5.

Spell Effect: Tempest Form (Water).name: Spell Effect: Tempest Form (Water)
Spell Effect: Tempest Form (Water).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.zhqnMOVPzVvWSUbC]{Tempest Form}

Your body becomes fluid to better suit your surroundings.

When you cast this spell, choose whether to become air, water, or mist. The spell gains the air trait if you choose air or mist, and the water trait if you choose water or mist.

You become amorphous, as does your armor. You lose any item bonus to AC and use your proficiency bonus for unarmored defense to determine your AC. You also gain resistance 10 to physical damage and become immune to precision damage. You can slip through tiny cracks and don't need to breathe. You can't cast spells, activate items, or use actions that have the attack or manipulate trait. You also gain the following effects based on your form.

Water

  • You gain a Swim Speed of 20 feet and become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} while you are in the water.
  • You can electrically charge yourself by taking a single action, which has the manipulate trait. If you do, you are no longer Invisible in the water due to electricity indicating your location, but any creature that makes a melee attack against you takes [[/r {1d6}[electricity]]]{1d6电击伤害}; if it touches you, this is cumulative with the damage from your major curse.

Heightened (+2) Increase the resistance by 5 and the electricity damage from the charged water form by 1.

Spell Effect: Tempt Fate.name: Spell Effect: Tempt Fate
Spell Effect: Tempt Fate.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.GqvKSxzN7A7kuFk4]{Tempt Fate}。

The target gains a +1 status bonus to the triggering saving throw.

If the saving throw's result is a success, it becomes a critical success. If it's a failure, it becomes a critical failure, and the critical failure can't be reduced by abilities that usually reduce critical failure, such as improved evasion.

Heightened (8th) The bonus on the saving throw is +2.

Spell Effect: Thicket of Knives.name: Spell Effect: Thicket of Knives
Spell Effect: Thicket of Knives.description: You create numerous phantom copies of your weapon arm, hiding your true movements and rendering your attacks unpredictable. You gain a +2 status bonus to Deception checks. If you're untrained in Deception, you can use the Feint action anyway, and add your level as your proficiency bonus despite being untrained.

Spell Effect: Thundering Dominance.name: Spell Effect: Thundering Dominance
Spell Effect: Thundering Dominance.description:
You shroud the target in a powerful predatory aura and amplify its vocalizations. It gains a +1 status bonus to Intimidation checks. Once during this spell's duration, it can take the Thundering Roar action.

Heightened (+2) The status bonus to Intimidation checks increases by 1 (to a maximum of a +4 status bonus for an 8th-level spell), and the damage from the roar increases by 2d8.

Spell Effect: Touch of Corruption.name: Spell Effect: Touch of Corruption
Spell Effect: Touch of Corruption.description: Granted by failing the save against @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.jFmWSIpJGGebim6y]{Touch of Corruption}。

Spell Effect: Traveler's Transit (Climb).name: Spell Effect: Traveler's Transit (Climb)
Spell Effect: Traveler's Transit (Climb).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.LrhTFHUtSS9ahogL]{Traveler's Transit}。

You gain a climb speed equal to your land speed.

Spell Effect: Traveler's Transit (Fly).name: Spell Effect: Traveler's Transit (Fly)
Spell Effect: Traveler's Transit (Fly).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.LrhTFHUtSS9ahogL]{Traveler's Transit}。

You gain a fly speed equal to your land speed.

Spell Effect: Traveler's Transit (Swim).name: Spell Effect: Traveler's Transit (Swim)
Spell Effect: Traveler's Transit (Swim).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.LrhTFHUtSS9ahogL]{Traveler's Transit}。

You gain a swim speed equal to your land speed.

Spell Effect: Triple Time.name: Spell Effect: Triple Time
Spell Effect: Triple Time.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.c8R2fpk88fBwJ1ie]{Triple Time}

You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed.

Spell Effect: True Strike.name: Spell Effect: True Strike
Spell Effect: True Strike.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Gb7SeieEvd0pL2Eh]{True Strike}.

A glimpse into the future ensures your next blow strikes true. The next time you make an attack roll before the end of your turn, roll the attack twice and use the better result. The attack ignores circumstance penalties to the attack roll and any flat check required due to the target being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}.

Spell Effect: Unblinking Flame Aura.name: Spell Effect: Unblinking Flame Aura
Spell Effect: Unblinking Flame Aura.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.floDCUOSzT0F6r77]{Unblinking Flame Aura}

You gain a +2 status bonus on Perception checks and resistance 10 to cold.

Spell Effect: Unblinking Flame Ignition.name: Spell Effect: Unblinking Flame Ignition
Spell Effect: Unblinking Flame Ignition.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.aFd00WT266VYPqOG]{Unblinking Flame Ignition}

You gain greater darkvision, low‐light vision, and the ability to see invisible creatures. You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed as you launch flame from your aura to soar through the sky. You become quickened, and you can use the extra action each round only to Strike or Fly using your flames.

Spell Effect: Unbreaking Wave Barrier.name: Spell Effect: Unbreaking Wave Barrier
Spell Effect: Unbreaking Wave Barrier.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.YtJXpiu4ijkB6nP2]{Unbreaking Wave Barrier}

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC.

Spell Effect: Unbreaking Wave Vapor.name: Spell Effect: Unbreaking Wave Vapor
Spell Effect: Unbreaking Wave Vapor.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.ZQk2cGBCkATO25w0]{Unbreaking Wave Vapor}

You're concealed against the triggering attack and gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against it.

Spell Effect: Untwisting Iron Augmentati.name: Spell Effect: Untwisting Iron Augmentation
Spell Effect: Untwisting Iron Augmentati.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.8eOMAIvT7S1CJSit]{Untwisting Iron Augmentation}

Your unarmed attacks are treated as cold iron and silver, they gain the earth trait, and they gain a +1 status bonus to damage rolls per damage die.

Spell Effect: Untwisting Iron Pillar.name: Spell Effect: Untwisting Iron Pillar
Spell Effect: Untwisting Iron Pillar.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9DtuMEyHhtHFRp5a]{Untwisting Iron Pillar}

You gain 50 temporary Hit Points that last for the duration or until you lose them, as well as resistance 5 to all physical damage (except adamantine).

Spell Effect: Variable Gravity (High Gra.name: Spell Effect: Variable Gravity (High Gravity)
Spell Effect: Variable Gravity (High Gra.description: You gain a +2 status bonus to your saving throws and DCs to resist forced movement and attempts to knock you prone

Spell Effect: Veil of Dreams.name: Spell Effect: Veil of Dreams
Spell Effect: Veil of Dreams.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.NNoKWiWKqJkdD2ln]{Veil of Dreams}

The target takes a -1 status penalty to Perception, attack rolls, and Will saves. This penalty increases to -2 for Will saves against sleep effects.

Spell Effect: Vital Beacon.name: Spell Effect: Vital Beacon
Spell Effect: Vital Beacon.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.ikSb3LRGnrwXJBVX]{Vital Beacon}
Vitality radiates outward from you, allowing others to supplicate and receive healing. Once per round, either you or an ally can use an Interact action to supplicate and lay hands upon you to regain Hit Points. Each time the beacon heals someone, it decreases in strength. It restores 4d10 Hit Points to the first creature, 4d8 Hit Points to the second, 4d6 Hit Points to the third, and 4d4 Hit Points to the fourth, after which the spell ends. You can have only one vital beacon active at a time.
[[/r (@item.level)d10[healing]]]{First Activation (d10)}
[[/r (@item.level)d8[healing]]]{Second Activation (d8)}
[[/r (@item.level)d6[healing]]]{Third Activation (d6)}
[[/r (@item.level)d4[healing]]]{Fourth Activation (d4)}

Spell Effect: Warding Aggression (+1).name: Spell Effect: Warding Aggression (+1)
Spell Effect: Warding Aggression (+1).description:
Warding aggression ends if the foe you attacked dies or at the end of any turn in which you didn't hit that foe with a melee Strike.

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC against the foe for the remaining duration.

Spell Effect: Warding Aggression (+2).name: Spell Effect: Warding Aggression (+2)
Spell Effect: Warding Aggression (+2).description:
Warding aggression ends if the foe you attacked dies or at the end of any turn in which you didn't hit that foe with a melee Strike.

You gain a +2 status bonus to AC against the foe for the remaining duration.

Spell Effect: Warding Aggression (+3).name: Spell Effect: Warding Aggression (+3)
Spell Effect: Warding Aggression (+3).description: You gain a +3 status bonus to AC against the foe for 1 round

Spell Effect: Wash Your Luck.name: Spell Effect: Wash Your Luck
Spell Effect: Wash Your Luck.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.lmHmKGs1N3yNAvln]{Wash Your Luck}。

Once during the spell's duration, before rolling a check, you can cancel out a misfortune effect on that roll, as normal when a fortune and misfortune effect apply to the same roll. After canceling out the misfortune effect, the spell ends, and you are then temporarily immune to wash your luck for 10 minutes.

Spell Effect: Weapon Surge.name: Spell Effect: Weapon Surge
Spell Effect: Weapon Surge.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.W37iBXLsY2trJ1rS]{Weapon Surge} when applied to a weapon without a major striking rune.

On your next Strike with that weapon before the start of your next turn, you gain a +1 status bonus to the attack roll and the weapon deals an additional die of damage.

If the weapon has a striking rune, this instead increases the number of dice from the striking rune by 1 (to a maximum of 3 extra weapon dice).

Spell Effect: Weapon Surge (Major Striki.name: Spell Effect: Weapon Surge (Major Striking)
Spell Effect: Weapon Surge (Major Striki.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.W37iBXLsY2trJ1rS]{Weapon Surge} when applied to a weapon with a major striking rune.

On your next Strike with that weapon before the start of your next turn, you gain a +1 status bonus to the attack roll.

Spell Effect: Wild Shape.name: Spell Effect: Wild Shape
Spell Effect: Wild Shape.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.8RWfKConLYFZpQ9X]{Wild Shape}

You infuse yourself with primal essence and transform into another form.

You can polymorph into any form listed in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gfPjmG6Fe6D3MFjl]{Pest Form}, which lasts 10 minutes. All other wild shape forms last 1 minute. You can add more forms to your wild shape list with druid feats; your feat might grant you some or all of the forms from a given polymorph spell.

When you transform into a form granted by a spell, you gain all the effects of the form you chose from a version of the spell heightened to wild shape's level.

Wild shape allows you to use your own shapeshifting training more easily than most polymorph spells. When you choose to use your own attack modifier while polymorphed instead of the form's default attack modifier, you gain a +2 status bonus to your attack rolls.

Spell Effect: Zealous Conviction.name: Spell Effect: Zealous Conviction
Spell Effect: Zealous Conviction.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.GYD0XZ4t3tQq6shc]{Zealous Conviction}

You bypass your targets' rational minds, instilling them with unshakable conviction and zeal. The targets each gain 12 temporary Hit Points and a +2 status bonus to Will saves against mental effects, as their faith overrides the signals from their own bodies and minds. If you tell a target to do something, it must comply with your request, though if it would normally find the task repugnant, it can attempt a Will save at the end of its turn each round due to the cognitive dissonance. On a success, it ends the spell's effects on itself entirely.

Effect: Shield Immunity.name: 效果: 护盾术免疫 Shield Immunity
Effect: Shield Immunity.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{护盾术 Shield}

使用盾牌格挡后，法术结束，你在10分钟内无法再施放它。

Effect: Guidance Immunity.name: 效果: 神导术免疫 Guidance Immunity
Effect: Guidance Immunity.description: 当某人对你施放@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.izcxFQFwf3woCnFs]{神导术 Guidance}后，自动获得等于本效果持续时间的临时免疫。

Spell Effect: Ancestral Form.name: 法术效果: 先祖形态 Ancestral Form
Spell Effect: Ancestral Form.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.xEjGEBvTfDJECSki]{先祖形态 Ancestral Form}

你变为祖灵的形态，变得 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible} 和半实半虚。你获得10点对所有伤害的抗力（力场伤害和幽冥性能符文的打击无视此抗力），该抗力在对抗非魔法攻击和穿刺伤害时加倍。

你获得等于陆地速度的飞行速度；在 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.cS9nfDRGD83bNU1p]{飞行 Flying}时，垂直上升对你不是困难地形。你无法穿过固体，但可以漂浮挤过狭小裂缝。

你无法施法（但可以 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.3f5DMFu8fPiqHpRg]{维持法术 Sustain a Spell}）、启动物品、使用带攻击或操纵特征的动作。

升阶 (+2) 抗力增加5。

Spell Effect: Inside Ropes (3rd level).name: 法术效果: 内脏绳索(3环) Inside Ropes (3rd level)
Spell Effect: Inside Ropes (3rd level).description: 当你使用内脏进行攀爬时，你的运动检定有+1物品加值。

Spell Effect: Accelerating Touch.name: 法术效果: 加速之触 Accelerating Touch
Spell Effect: Accelerating Touch.description:
若你具有@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.aiHbS8FGNYAQBF62]{加速之触 Accelerating Touch}专长，@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{圣疗 Lay on Hands}获得此效果。

若法术目标是你的盟友，他们的AC获得+2状态加值，速度获得+10尺状态加值，持续一轮。

Spell Effect: Animal Feature (Claws).name: 法术效果: 动物特征 Animal Feature (利爪)
Spell Effect: Animal Feature (Claws).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.vGEgI8e7AW6FQ3tP]{动物特征 Animal Feature}。

你获得爪抓攻击，这可以造成[[/r {1d6}[slashing]]]{1d6挥砍伤害}，并具有灵巧、娴熟和非武装特征。

Spell Effect: Animal Feature (Fish Tail).name: 法术效果: 动物特征 Animal Feature (鱼尾)
Spell Effect: Animal Feature (Fish Tail).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.vGEgI8e7AW6FQ3tP]{动物特征 Animal Feature}。

你获得等同于自身陆上速度的游泳速度。

Spell Effect: Animal Feature (Jaws).name: 法术效果: 动物特征 Animal Feature (锐齿)
Spell Effect: Animal Feature (Jaws).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.vGEgI8e7AW6FQ3tP]{动物特征 Animal Feature}。

你获得啃咬攻击，这可以造成[[/r {1d8}[piercing]]]{1d8穿刺伤害}，并具有非武装特征。

Spell Effect: Animal Feature (Owl Eyes).name: 法术效果: 动物特征 Animal Feature (枭瞳)
Spell Effect: Animal Feature (Owl Eyes).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.vGEgI8e7AW6FQ3tP]{动物特征 Animal Feature}。

你获得黑暗视觉。

Spell Effect: Animal Feature (Wings).name: 法术效果: 动物特征 Animal Feature (双翼)
Spell Effect: Animal Feature (Wings).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.vGEgI8e7AW6FQ3tP]{动物特征 Animal Feature}。

你获得等同于自身陆上速度的飞行速度。

Spell Effect: Animal Feature (Cat Eyes).name: 法术效果: 动物特征 Animal Feature (猫眼)
Spell Effect: Animal Feature (Cat Eyes).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.vGEgI8e7AW6FQ3tP]{动物特征 Animal Feature}。

你获得昏暗视觉。

Spell Effect: Animal Form (Ape).name: 法术效果: 动物特征 Animal Form (猿)
Spell Effect: Animal Form (Ape).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wp09USMB3GIW1qbp]{动物形态 Animal Form}。

你唤动原能力量，将自身变形为中型动物战斗形态。当你施放该法术时，首先选择猿、熊、牛、犬、猫、鹿、蛙、鲨、或者蛇。

你可以决定特定动物的类型（例如对于猫可以选择狮子或者雪豹），但这对该形态的体型及数据没有影响。处于该形态时，你获得动物特征。你可以解消该法术。

你获得后续数据和能力，无论你选择哪种战斗形态：

  • AC = 16 + 你的等级。忽略你的护甲检定减值和速度减值。
  • 5临时生命值。
  • 昏暗视觉和模糊嗅觉30尺。
  • 一个或多个由你选择的战斗形态决定的无武装近战攻击，这是你仅能使用的攻击。你对这些攻击受训。你的攻击调整值为+9、你的伤害加值为+1。这些攻击基于力量（例如对于 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled} 状态而言）。如果你的无武装攻击加值更高，你能改为使用该加值。
  • 运动调整值+9，除非你自身的调整值更高。

你也会根据你选择的动物类型获得特定能力：

  • 猿 Ape
    • 速度25尺, 攀爬速度20尺;
    • 近战 1 拳击, 伤害 2d6钝击。

升阶 (3rd) 你改为获得10临时生命值，AC=17+你的等级，攻击调整值+14，伤害加值+5，运动+14。

升阶 (4环) 你的战斗形态为大型，并且你的攻击具有10尺触及。你必须有足够空间扩大体型，否则你会失去法术。你改为获得15临时生命值、AC=18+你的等级、攻击调整值+16、伤害加值+9、运动+16。

升阶 (5环) 你的战斗形态为超大型，并且你的攻击具有15尺触及。你必须有足够空间扩大体型，否则你会失去法术。你改为获得20临时生命值、AC=18+你的等级、攻击调整值+18、伤害加值+7且伤害骰子数量翻倍、运动+20。

Spell Effect: Elephant Form.name: 法术效果: 大象形态 Elephant Form
Spell Effect: Elephant Form.description:
施放@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.zjYQyuBNT5VjV4mz]{大象形态 Elephant Form}时获得此效果。

你引导自然的原始能量，变形为巨大的战斗形态。特别是强大而可怕的大象或类似生物，如猛犸象，乳齿象或互棱齿象。此法术具有@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.KhM8MhoUgoUjBMIz]{恐龙形态 Dinosaur Form}的效果，但用以下数据取代恐龙形态的原始数据。

  • 速度 40尺；
  • 近战 1 脚踩，伤害 2d8 钝击；
  • 近战 1 象鼻（触及10尺），效果 象鼻缠卷；
  • 近战 1 象牙（触及10尺），伤害 2d6 穿刺。

象鼻缠卷 Grabbing Trunk 被你象鼻击中的生物如果体型小于你但最多小两阶，则会自动被你的象鼻@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}。如果你对已经被你象鼻擒抱的生物进行成功的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{擒拿 Grapple}检定，则你能将其移动到你触及范围内的其他空间。

升阶（5环） 你的大象形态为超大型；你的象鼻和象牙攻击有15尺触及，你的脚踩攻击有10尺触及。你获得20点临时生命值，攻击调整值+18，伤害加值+6，伤害骰翻倍，并且运动+21。

升阶（7环） 你的大象形态为巨型；你的象鼻和象牙攻击有20尺触及，你的脚踩攻击有15尺触及。你的AC为21+你的等级，你获得25点临时生命值，攻击调整值+25，伤害加值+15，伤害骰翻倍，并且运动+25。

Spell Effect: Angelic Wings.name: 法术效果: 天使之翼 Angelic Wings
Spell Effect: Angelic Wings.description: 效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.kRsmUlSWhi6PJvZ7]{天使之翼 Angelic Wings}

Spell Effect: Angel Form (Monadic Deva).name: 法术效果: 天使形态 Angel Form (元素使徒)
Spell Effect: Angel Form (Monadic Deva).description:
通过唤来天界的力量，你变形为中型天使战斗形态。当你施放该法术时，选择巴尔伊斯、科洛天使、元素使徒、或者光暗使徒。如果你选择科洛天使，则该战斗形态为小型。处于该形态时，你获得天使和天族特征。处于该战斗形态时，你具有手并且可以使用操作动作。你可以解消该法术。

你获得后续数据和能力，无论你选择哪种形态：

  • AC=22+你的等级。忽略你的护甲检定减值和速度减值。
  • 40临时生命值，以及对邪恶伤害的弱点10。
  • 黑暗视觉。
  • 一个或多个由你选择的战斗形态决定的攻击。你对这些攻击受训。你的攻击调整值是+25，并且你使用列出的伤害。近战攻击基于力量（例如对于力竭的情况），所有的远程攻击都基于敏捷。如果给出的非武装攻击或者武器，你的的攻击调整值更高，你能改为使用该加值。
  • 运动调整值+25，除非你自身的调整值更高。

你也会根据你选择的天使的类型获得特定能力：

  • 元素使徒 Monadic Deva 速度 30尺，飞行 40尺；对抗死亡效果和操控灵魂的效果的豁免+2状态加值；
    • 近战 1 神圣硬头锤 (猛推), 伤害 2d6+12钝击加上1d6力场和 1d6善良。

升阶 (9环级) 你的战斗形态为大型。你必须有空间扩大体型，否则你会失去法术。你改为获得60临时生命值、对邪恶伤害弱点15、攻击调整值+30、伤害加值+20、运动+33。

Spell Effect: Angel Form (Movanic Deva).name: 法术效果: 天使形态 Angel Form (光暗使徒)
Spell Effect: Angel Form (Movanic Deva).description:
通过唤来天界的力量，你变形为中型天使战斗形态。当你施放该法术时，选择巴尔伊斯、科洛天使、元素使徒、或者光暗使徒。如果你选择科洛天使，则该战斗形态为小型。处于该形态时，你获得天使和天族特征。处于该战斗形态时，你具有手并且可以使用操作动作。你可以解消该法术。

  • 40临时生命值，以及对邪恶伤害的弱点10。
  • 黑暗视觉。
  • 一个或多个由你选择的战斗形态决定的攻击。你对这些攻击受训。你的攻击调整值是+25，并且你使用列出的伤害。近战攻击基于力量（例如对于力竭的情况），所有的远程攻击都基于敏捷。如果给出的非武装攻击或者武器，你的的攻击调整值更高，你能改为使用该加值。
  • 运动调整值+25，除非你自身的调整值更高。

你也会根据你选择的天使的类型获得特定能力：

  • 光暗使徒 Movanic Deva 速度 30尺，飞行 40尺；负能量抗力10；
    • 近战 1 重剑 (双手 d12), 伤害 1d8+12挥砍加上1d6火焰和 1d6善良。

升阶 (9环级) 你的战斗形态为大型。你必须有空间扩大体型，否则你会失去法术。你改为获得60临时生命值、对邪恶伤害弱点15、攻击调整值+30、伤害加值+20、运动+33。

Spell Effect: Angel Form (Balisse).name: 法术效果: 天使形态 Angel Form (巴尔伊斯)
Spell Effect: Angel Form (Balisse).description:
通过唤来天界的力量，你变形为中型天使战斗形态。当你施放该法术时，选择巴尔伊斯、科洛天使、元素使徒、或者光暗使徒。如果你选择科洛天使，则该战斗形态为小型。处于该形态时，你获得天使和天族特征。处于该战斗形态时，你具有手并且可以使用操作动作。你可以解消该法术。

  • 运动调整值+25，除非你自身的调整值更高。

你也会根据你选择的天使的类型获得特定能力：

  • 巴尔伊斯 Balisse 速度 30尺，飞行 40尺； 发现谎言和幻觉的察觉调整值+26，除非你的调整值更高；
    • 近战 1 弯刀 (蓄力, 横扫), 伤害 2d6+12挥砍加上1d6火焰和 1d6善良。

升阶 (9环级) 你的战斗形态为大型。你必须有空间扩大体型，否则你会失去法术。你改为获得60临时生命值、对邪恶伤害弱点15、攻击调整值+30、伤害加值+20、运动+33。

Spell Effect: Angel Form (Choral).name: 法术效果: 天使形态 Angel Form (科洛天使)
Spell Effect: Angel Form (Choral).description:
通过唤来天界的力量，你变形为中型天使战斗形态。当你施放该法术时，选择巴尔伊斯、科洛天使、元素使徒、或者光暗使徒。如果你选择科洛天使，则该战斗形态为小型。处于该形态时，你获得天使和天族特征。处于该战斗形态时，你具有手并且可以使用操作动作。你可以解消该法术。

你获得后续数据和能力，无论你选择哪种形态：

  • AC=22+你的等级。忽略你的护甲检定减值和速度减值。
  • 40临时生命值，以及对邪恶伤害的弱点10。
  • 黑暗视觉。
  • 一个或多个由你选择的战斗形态决定的攻击。你对这些攻击受训。你的攻击调整值是+25，并且你使用列出的伤害。近战攻击基于力量（例如对于力竭的情况），所有的远程攻击都基于敏捷。如果给出的非武装攻击或者武器，你的的攻击调整值更高，你能改为使用该加值。
  • 运动调整值+25，除非你自身的调整值更高。

你也会根据你选择的天使的类型获得特定能力：

  • 科洛天使 Choral 速度 30尺，飞行 40尺；对抗音波和听觉效果的AC和豁免+1状态加值；
    • 近战 1 拳 (灵巧), 伤害 2d6+12钝击加上1d6善良；
    • 远程 1 刺耳圣歌 (射程 90 尺), 伤害 1d6+12音波加上1d6善良，并且重击时 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened} 1轮。

升阶 (9环级) 你的战斗形态为大型。你必须有空间扩大体型，否则你会失去法术。你改为获得60临时生命值、对邪恶伤害弱点15、攻击调整值+30、伤害加值+20、运动+33。

Spell Effect: Infectious Melody.name: 法术效果: 妙曲传唱 Infectious Melody
Spell Effect: Infectious Melody.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.mUz3wqbMQ5JQ06M5]{妙曲传唱 Infectious Melody}

成功 在1轮内，该生物只能按照该旋律唱着来交流。它只能在其回合中说话，并且如此做时必须使用演出（Perform）动作。表演检定的结果决定了其唱歌的好坏，但是无论结果如何，它总是能交流信息，这除了要花费动作的时间外没有其他机制上的影响。一次演出检定足够该生物在回合内进行任意量的说话。该效果可能会干扰语言成分或者其他需要精确发言的语言能力；如果要成功使用这样的能力，该生物必须成功通过一次@Check[type:flat|dc:5]检定。

除此之外，由于唱歌让威慑力打折扣，该生物在语言威吓检定上承受-2状态减值。该生物一直哼唱旋律也让它几乎不可能保持无踪。

失败 如同成功，但持续时间为3轮。

大失败 如同成功，但持续时间为1小时。

Spell Effect: Apex Companion.name: 法术效果: 巅峰伙伴 Apex Companion
Spell Effect: Apex Companion.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.qqQYrXaRJXr7uc4i]{巅峰伙伴 Apex Companion}。

你的动物伙伴在巅峰形态下获得以下数据和能力：

  • 你的动物伙伴变成超大型，攻击触及15尺。它必须有足够的空间来变大，否则法术丢失。
  • 30临时生命值
  • 黑暗视觉
  • 你的动物伙伴的伤害骰增大1级，它的攻击获得致命d12特征
  • 它的速度获得+10尺状态加值，它无视困难地形和高等困难地形

注意: 此效果不会增加动物伙伴的伤害骰，也不会在其攻击上添加致命d12特征。

Spell Effect: Aberrant Form (Gug).name: 法术效果: 异怪形态 Aberrant Form (古革巨人)
Spell Effect: Aberrant Form (Gug).description:
借由邪恶存在的力量，你将自己转变为一个大型异怪。你必须有足够空间扩大体型，否则你会失去法术。当你施放该法术时，选择甲伏怪、高基特斯、古革巨人、或者食腐怪。处于该形态时，你获得异怪特征。你可以解消该法术。

你获得后续数据和能力，无论你选择哪种战斗形态：

  • AC=18+你的等级。忽略你的护甲检定减值和速度减值。
  • 13临时生命值。
  • 黑暗视觉。
  • 一个或多个由你选择的战斗形态决定的无武装近战攻击，这是你仅能使用的攻击。你对这些攻击受训。你的攻击调整值是+18，并且你使用列出的伤害。这些攻击基于力量（例如对于力竭状态而言）。如果你的无武装攻击调整值更高，你能改为使用该调整值。
  • 运动调整值+20，除非你自身的调整值更高。

你也会根据你选择的异怪类型获得特定能力：

  • 古革巨人 Gug
    • 速度 40尺，攀爬 20尺；
    • 近战 1 啃咬 (触及10尺), 伤害 2d12+8 穿刺;
    • 近战 1 爪 (灵巧, 触及 10 尺), 伤害 2d8+8 挥砍;
    • 你的数个关节让你能如同中型生物一般进入狭窄空间。

升阶 (6环级) 你的战斗形态为超大型，并你的攻击的触及增加5尺。你必须有空间扩大体型，否则你会失去法术。你改为获得AC=21+你的等级、26临时生命、攻击调整值+22、伤害加值+13、以及运动+23。

Spell Effect: Aerial Form (Pterosaur).name: 法术效果: 御空形态 Aerial Form (翼龙)
Spell Effect: Aerial Form (Pterosaur).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.NzXpEzcZAjuDTZjK]{御空形态 Aerial Form}。

你借用自身对原能的掌握以强化自身，将自己的身体重塑为中型飞行动物的战斗形态。当你施放这个法术时，选择蝙蝠、鸟类、翼龙或者黄蜂。你可以决定特定动物类型（例如对于鸟可以选猫头鹰或者鹰），但这对该形态的体型及数据没有影响。处于该形态时，你获得动物特征。你可以解消该法术。

你获得后续数据和能力，无论你选择哪种战斗形态：

  • AC=18+你的等级。忽略你的护甲检定减值和速度减值。
  • 5临时生命值。
  • 昏暗视觉
  • 一个或多个由你选择的战斗形态决定的无武装近战攻击，这是你仅能使用的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{攻击 Strike}。你对这些攻击受训。你的攻击调整值为+16、伤害调整值为+5。这些攻击基于敏捷属性（例如对于 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy} 状态）。如果你基于敏捷的非武装攻击的攻击调整值更高，你能改为使用该加值。
  • 特技调整值+16，除非你自身调整值更高。

你也会根据你选择的形态获得特定能力：

  • 翼龙 Pterosaur
    • 速度 10尺，飞行速度 40尺；模糊嗅觉30尺;
    • 近战 a 喙, 伤害 3d6 穿刺。

升阶 (5环级) 你的战斗形态为大型，并且你的飞行速度获得+10尺状态加值。你必须有足够空间扩大体型，否则你会失去法术。你改为获得10临时生命、攻击调整值+18、伤害加值+8、以及特技+20。

升阶 (6环级) 你的战斗形态为超大型、你的飞行速度获得+15尺状态加值、并且你的攻击获得10尺触及。你必须有足够空间扩大体型，否则你会失去法术。你改为获得AC=21+你的等级、15临时生命、攻击调整值+21、伤害加值+4并且伤害骰子翻倍（包括持续伤害）、以及特技+23。

升阶 (5环级) 你的战斗形态为大型，并且你的飞行速度获得+10尺状态加值。你必须有足够空间扩大体型，否则你会失去法术。你改为获得10临时生命、攻击调整值+18、伤害加值+8、以及特技+20。

Spell Effect: Amplifying Touch.name: 法术效果: 扬善之触 Amplifying Touch
Spell Effect: Amplifying Touch.description:
若你具有@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Cy5W8U4yN9P1EvBy]{扬善之触 Amplifying Touch}，@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{圣疗 Lay on Hands}获得此效果。

若法术目标是你的盟友，他们的AC获得+2状态加值，攻击骰获得+1状态加值，并且所有的打击都会增加1点额外善良伤害，持续到他们下一轮结束。

Spell Effect: Ki Strike.name: 法术效果: 斗气击 Ki Strike
Spell Effect: Ki Strike.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.ZL8NTvB22NeEWhVG]{斗气击 Ki Strike}

你打击的攻击骰获得+1状态加值，且打击造成1d6点额外伤害，伤害类型取决于你的选择。

升阶 (+4) 额外伤害增加1d6。

Spell Effect: Impeccable Flow.name: 法术效果: 无暇心流 Impeccable Flow
Spell Effect: Impeccable Flow.description:
由@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.8VzbumNyMEdSzZSz]{无暇心流Impeccable Flow}获得

你在察觉检定、豁免鉴定和技能检定上获得+1状态加值。

Spell Effect: Impeccable Flow (Critical.name: 法术效果: 无暇心流(大失败效果) Impeccable Flow (Critical Failure Effect)
Spell Effect: Impeccable Flow (Critical.description:
由@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.8VzbumNyMEdSzZSz]{无暇心流Impeccable Flow}获得

你让自己和潜在的宇宙秩序协调一致。当你处于此法术的协调状态下时，你在察觉检定、豁免鉴定和技能检定上获得+1状态加值。如果你受此法术影响的任何检定大失败，加值将终止，并且在法术剩余时间内所有检定都有-1状态减值。

Spell Effect: Barkskin (Arboreal's Reven.name: 法术效果: 树肤术(树精的复仇) Barkskin (Arboreal's Revenge)

Spell Effect: Practice Makes Perfect.name: 法术效果: 熟能生巧 Practice Makes Perfect
Spell Effect: Practice Makes Perfect.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.HOj2YsTpkoMpYJH9]{熟能生巧 Practice Makes Perfect}。

目标在触发的检定上获得+2状态加值，如果目标的熟练为大师或更高，则改为+3。这个加值可以改变检定结果。

Spell Effect: Community Repair (Critical.name: 法术效果: 社区修复(大失败) Community Repair (大失败)
Spell Effect: Community Repair (Critical.description: 公共工程拒绝被修复，而社区成员的记忆也因为这个拙劣的仪式而恶化。在接下来的一周内，当施法者位于仪式地点60尺内时，他们将无法从有益的情绪效果中获得任何好处，并且会因为踌躇不前导致速度受到-10尺状态减值。

Spell Effect: Community Repair (Critical.name: 法术效果: 社区修复(大成功) Community Repair (Critical Success)
Spell Effect: Community Repair (Critical.description: 大成功 公共工程恢复如新，并且在社区意识的激励下获得了更高的品质。在接下来的一周内，当施法者位于仪式地点60尺以内时，他们对抗情绪效果的意志豁免检定有+1状态加值，速度获得+10尺状态加值。

Spell Effect: Adapt Self (Swim).name: 法术效果: 自体适应 Adapt Self (游泳)
Spell Effect: Adapt Self (Swim).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.GUnw9YXaW3YyaCAU]{自体适应 Adapt Self}。

你获得基本速度一半的游泳速度。

Spell Effect: Adapt Self (Darkvision).name: 法术效果: 自体适应 Adapt Self (黑暗视觉)
Spell Effect: Adapt Self (Darkvision).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.GUnw9YXaW3YyaCAU]{自体适应 Adapt Self}。

你获得黑暗视觉。

Spell Effect: Adaptive Ablation.name: 法术效果: 适应能量 Adaptive Ablation
Spell Effect: Adaptive Ablation.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.GoKkejPj5yWJPIPK]{适应能量 Adaptive Ablation}

你获得触发能量类型的抗力。你是在承受伤害后才获得此抗力，因此只能减少法术持续时间内后续的伤害。

Spell Effect: Wind Jump.name: 法术效果: 风行跃 Wind Jump
Spell Effect: Wind Jump.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.kRxlkPPe6Gr7Du59]{风行跃 Wind Jump}

你获得等同于速度的飞行速度。你必须在坚实的地面上结束回合，否则会坠落。

Spell Effect: Inspire Courage.description:
由@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.IAjvwqgiDr3qGYxY]{激发勇气 Inspire Courage}获得

你被鼓舞的语言或旋律激励了。你在攻击骰、伤害骰和对抗恐惧的豁免骰上获得+1状态加值。
